title: how do you deal with a losing streak?
body:
this is probably a qq post, oh well, you guys see it coming, haha.

so, i started my losing streak 3 days ago and till now, 7-8 ranked games lose it a row, kek, the 4-5th one i was so frustrated and tried my hardest to motivate my team to win when i normally dont even bother typing, but then the 6-8th ones i started didnt care XD. now i finally broke the curse. Im just wondering, was i losing because i was playing in labour day weekend? i constantly have other lanes feeding and teammate dont know how to win a 5v4... talking about plat2-diamond5 here.

for other players who wants to get to high elo like plat and diamond for non-toxic paradise, i can responsibly tell you that the skill level and toxic level are positively correlated here, so dont bother getting elo boost or anything, haha, you are paying for hella a ride =P

so yeah, toxicity and players just dont learn from their mistakes in the past 3 days, it was very frustrated for me when i was having a huge losing streak in ranked. how do you guys normally deal with this kinda frustration
